event_subscriptions.description: These are the specific types of events to which your organization may subscribe. `Enabled` events will be sent to your callback URL following Canopy's standard event subscription payload. Some event subscriptions may have additional configurations around when they are triggered.

enabled.description: Receive a notification whenever a charge occurs for one of your accounts.
Receive a notification whenever a payment occurs for one of your accounts.
Receive a notification whenever a fee is incurred for one of your accounts.
Receive a notification whenever a status change occurs for one of your accounts.
Receive a notification whenever a nonzero account `min_pay` is present for one of your accounts, at each of the provided `days_before_due`.
